reviewText: Sweet and funny movie for fans of Mitchell and Webb.

This film about two dysfunctional friends and their attempts to succeed in the dysfunctional world of magic is absolutely hysterical. It ranks with some of the best British comedy of the past decade, and seems to pull-off every awkward joke perfectly. The extras on the DVD are also quite funny. A true 5 star British comedy.
I cannot imagine anything being as funny as "Peep Show", but this is still quite good. I wish there were more feature length offerings from Mitchell and Webb.
